meanings.sent1: The kingless land had no ruler to make decisions.
meanings.sent2: The kingdom was kingless after the monarch passed away.
meanings.sent3: The kingless castle felt lonely without its royal inhabitant.
meanings.sent4: The kingless society had to find new ways to govern themselves.
meanings.sent5: The kingless throne room echoed with emptiness and uncertainty.

meanings.sent1: The kingless country had a different form of government.
meanings.sent2: The people in the kingless nation elected their leaders.
meanings.sent3: The kingless village held democratic elections to choose their mayor.
meanings.sent4: The kingless region embraced democracy over monarchy.
meanings.sent5: The kingless empire thrived under a system of elected officials.
